import React from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap' import { motion } from 'framer-motion' import { DeliveredProcedureOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons' import './services.css' import serviceData from '../assets/data/serviceData' const Services = () => { return (
{ serviceData.map((item, index) => ( {item.icon}

{item.title}

{item.subtitle}

)) }
) } export default Services
